page.title: 14DALWOOD P.O & STORES
page.content: Dalwood Village stores is kept by Mr and Mrs Saynor. The shop, in the centre of Dalwood village, sells groceries, fruit and vegetables,toiletries,bread, cakes, confectionary,small toys,frozen foods,greetings cards and books.The sub post office deals with stamps, postal orders, pensions,child allowances and savings. This year the post office was broken into and the safe taken. The thieves took away the safe on a trolley. They took it to a field and broke into the back of it. Â£3000 was taken, only two half pennies were left. Postal orders were found the following morning blowing along the road. The robbery took place at 3o'clock in the morning.The dog did not bark.So far the robbers have not been caught.
